name: Resistance is Not Futile
description:
ResistJam 2017 Entry - Resistance is Not Futile!

A short platformer about losing your freedoms by an oppressor who convinces others that they must have what you have for them to be great - when in reality they had those same things all along.

CONTROLS:

Left / Right Arrow Keys to Move

Space to Jump

Force-Quit to Exit

Should also work with a gamepad but I didn't test it. Oops.

A buggy mess thrown together in 24 hours and submitted with 36 minutes to go. Uses purchased visual assets, and a number of tools I had laying around that was built for other games such as A Purrtato Tail.
